discussion.author: gares
discussion.comment: @affeldt-aist I merged the other PR and rebased this one. I think you should merge the CI is green (coq-master is broken, the others should work)

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment: As discussed in the MathComp meeting, I thought we should put some parentheses here (to control the ordering of applying rewrite rules), although this does not seem to be a blocking issue. https://github.com/math-comp/math-comp/blob/master/mathcomp/fingroup/fingroup.v#L640-L641 https://github.com/math-comp/math-comp/blob/master/mathcomp/ssreflect/ssrnat.v#L1849

review_discussion.author: gares
review_discussion.comment: I don't recall this feature to be documented (I mean, the order being altered by parentheses).

commits.author: proux01
commits.message:
Backport interval lemmas from Analysis
